last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 12
last_episode_to_air.overview:
Violet finally dumps her investor Jim and takes Mark Prince up on his offer to become the backer of her website. She now has to move quickly to make sure everything is in place for the site’s launch.

Vid sends his demo reel to the major L.A. porn studios in pursuit of a lifelong dream. He immediately receives an invitation to meet with Paul Thomas, a leading porn director. Vid goes to L.A. and soaks up the atmosphere of “Porn Valley.”

Uncle D lands himself a gig as a guest on a well-known TV show, Ed the Sock, building up his persona as The Canadian Assman.

Celt proposes to a very pregnant Angelique in New York’s Central Park. She accepts. Their engagement is followed by the birth of a baby girl. Now Angelique and Celt must delicately balance their roles as proud parents with their careers in adult entertainment.

name: Webdreams
overview: Webdreams is a Gemini Award-nominated Canadian TV show produced by Showcase. It airs on Showcase and IFC.
